metadata.title: About Vispaico | Ship It. - Anti-Agency Web Development Team. Fast Results, No BS
metadata.description: Meet Vispaico. Vispaico builds websites without the agency nonsense. Fast delivery, straight talk, real results for 138+ businesses.

hero.title: We Are Vispaico
paragraphs: Hi, I'm Niels. I built Vispaico because I was tired of the bullshit.
I've been writing code for 20+ years. Started in East Germany, worked across England, Belgium, and spent 15 years in Spain‚Äîmostly in the car industry, bouncing between factories and client sites.
The problem? I had an authority problem. Always did. Hated being told to wait, to slow down, to 'follow the process' when I knew we could ship faster.

After two decades of global travel (airports, hotels, meetings that could've been emails), I landed in Vietnam. Met my wife, started a family, and realized I was done moving. But I wasn't done building.
So I started Vispaico in 2019. The mission was simple: build websites the way they should be built‚Äîfast, modern, no agency markup, no waiting weeks for something that takes 24 hours.
hero.frustrationsHeading: Here's what pisses me off about this industry:
frustrations: Overpriced agencies charging $10K for a basic site
Slow WordPress sites that kill your credibility
Jargon-heavy devs who hide behind complexity
Waiting times that make no sense
differences: We ship in 24 hours (12 hours if you're in a rush, 6 if it's an emergency)
We cut everything that can be cut‚ÄîAI handles the boring parts, scripts handle the tedious parts
We speak human, not dev jargon
We're in Vietnam, which means better rates and time zone magic (you brief us, we build while you sleep)
hero.familyParagraph: The best part? I'm building this with my kids. My three kids watch me work, help with small tasks, and learn that you don't need permission to build something great. My oldest son from Spain works with me full-time now.
hero.lifestyleParagraph: This isn't just a business. It's a lifestyle, a mindset, and a way to stay free.
hero.closing: If you're tired of agencies that move like molasses, let's talk.

coreValues.title: Fast Delivery
coreValues.description: We build websites while agencies are still scheduling discovery calls. Speed is our advantage.

coreValues.title: Straight Talk
coreValues.description: No jargon, no buzzwords, no consultant speak. We explain things in plain English.

coreValues.title: Fixed Pricing
coreValues.description: One price, one timeline, no surprises. What we quote is what you pay.

coreValues.title: Real Results
coreValues.description: We build websites that work for your business, not our design portfolio.

metadata.title: Accessibility Audit Service | Vispaico
metadata.description: Ensure your website is accessible to everyone. Comprehensive audits, formal certification, remediation guidance, and ongoing compliance support.

hero.badge: ‚úì WCAG 2.2 AA | EN 301 549 | EU Accessibility Act Compliant
hero.title: Accessibility Audit Service
hero.description: Ensure your website is truly accessible to everyone. Comprehensive audits, formal certification, and ongoing compliance support.

cards.title: 15% of the Population
cards.text: Over 1.3 billion people worldwide have disabilities. An inaccessible site excludes them‚Äîand their business.

cards.title: Legal Compliance
cards.text: The EU Accessibility Act (EAA) and BFSG require compliance. Non-compliance can result in significant fines and legal exposure.

cards.title: Better for Everyone
cards.text: Accessible design improves SEO, user experience, and conversion rates. It's not just ethical‚Äîit's smart business.

cards.title: Build Trust
cards.text: Formal WCAG 2.2 AA certification signals your commitment to inclusivity and attracts socially conscious customers.

items.title: Accessibility Audit
items.description: A comprehensive analysis of your website against WCAG 2.2 AA, EN 301 549, and EU regulations. We identify barriers, prioritize fixes, and provide actionable recommendations.

items.title: Compliance Certification
items.description: After remediation, we formally certify your website as WCAG 2.2 AA compliant. Receive an official certificate and badge to display on your site.

items.title: Annual Compliance Review
items.description: Ongoing compliance assurance. We perform yearly audits to ensure your site stays accessible as it evolves, and provide minor fixes included.

bundle.title: Complete Accessibility Package
bundle.intro: Get everything you need for full accessibility compliance, all in one package.
bundle.description: Everything you need for complete compliance, start to finish.

remediation.title: What If Your Audit Finds Issues?
introParagraphs: If your audit identifies accessibility issues, the cost to fix them depends entirely on the scope and complexity of work required. There's no fixed price because every website is different.
Here's how it works: After the audit, we'll provide a detailed remediation proposal breaking down exactly what needs to be fixed, why, and the estimated cost based on your specific issues.

scenarios.title: üü° Minimal Issues
scenarios.scope: Scope: A few low-complexity fixes (alt text, color contrast, ARIA labels)

scenarios.title: üü† Moderate Issues
scenarios.scope: Scope: Multiple issues requiring code updates, form improvements, keyboard navigation fixes

scenarios.title: üî¥ Major Issues
scenarios.scope: Scope: Significant structural changes, design system updates, accessibility rebuild

guarantee.heading: Our Guarantee
paragraphs: We provide a transparent, itemized proposal before we start any remediation work. No surprises. You'll know exactly what's included, how long it takes, and what it costs‚Äîbefore we lift a finger.
And if you choose Vispaico to handle the fixes, we include a re-audit and certification package as part of the deal.

testimonial.quote: We didn't realize how many users we were excluding until the audit. The findings were eye-opening, and the certification gave us confidence we're truly accessible now.
testimonial.name: Sarah M.

items.title: WCAG 2.2 AA
items.description: Web Content Accessibility Guidelines‚Äîthe global standard for web accessibility. Level AA is the recommended compliance level.

items.title: EN 301 549
items.description: European standard for digital accessibility. Specifically applies to ICT products and services in the EU.

items.title: EU Accessibility Act (EAA)
items.description: Mandatory for all websites and apps. Non-compliance can result in fines and legal action. Enforcement began in 2025.

items.title: BFSG (Germany)
items.description: German Barrier-free Strengthening Act. Additional regulations for websites targeting German users or businesses.

contact.title: Ready to Ensure Your Website Is Truly Accessible?
contact.description: Start with an audit and get clear, actionable insights into your site's accessibility status. From there, we'll guide you toward full compliance.

quickQuestions.title: Quick Questions

items.question: Is this the right website for me?
answer: A multi product store is a website that is dedicated to selling multiple products. It's a great way to focus your marketing efforts and drive sales.
Don't worry if you're not sure! We'll help you figure out what's best after you get in touch.

items.question: What information do you need from me?
answer: Business name, what you do, your main message, and any text or images you want included. Even a few sentences work ‚Äî we can build from there.

items.question: What about content creation?
answer: We handle copywriting and sourcing images if you don't have content ready. Just let us know what you've got, and we'll fill in the gaps.

items.question: What about the Domain, Hosting, and Emails?
answer: Yes. Everything's included:
- Domain registration for 1 year (if you need one)
- Web hosting for 1 year (no monthly fees)
- SSL security & GDPR compliant
- 3 professional email addresses
- Up to 100 email accounts total if needed
- Instructions to connect to Outlook, Apple Mail, etc.

items.question: What about support and changes?
answer: - 7-day unlimited revisions after delivery
- 30-day technical support for any bugs
- Full refund guarantee ‚Äî 100% satisfaction guarantee; if we don't deliver what we promised, you don't pay

items.question: How is this different from other agencies?
answer: We build, they talk.
- No discovery calls or strategy sessions
- No project managers or account executives
- No weekly meetings about progress
- No surprise costs or scope creep
- No 3-month timelines for simple websites
One payment. One timeline. One result.

quickQuestions.closingTitle: Ready in 10 Days for $1999 - Everything Included

bottomLine.title: The Bottom Line
paragraphs: While agencies schedule meetings to discuss scheduling meetings, your website launches.

metadata.title: Vispaico | Frequently Asked Questions
metadata.description: Get straight answers about timelines, revisions, hosting, support, and how Vispaico delivers websites without the agency drag.

items.question: What is Vispaico?
items.answer: We're a web development team that builds professional websites fast without the agency nonsense. No discovery calls, no project managers, no 6-month timelines. Just websites that work, delivered when promised.

items.question: Why should I choose you over a local web agency?
items.answer: Agencies charge $5k-15k and take 3-6 months with endless meetings. We deliver the same quality in days, not months, for a fraction of the cost. Plus you own everything - no monthly hosting fees or maintenance contracts.

items.question: What if I don't like the design?
items.answer: You get 7 days of unlimited revisions after delivery. We keep tweaking until you're happy. Most clients love the first version, but we're not done until you are.

items.question: Do you handle content and copywriting?
items.answer: Yes. If you don't have content ready, we'll write it for you. Just tell us about your business in your own words - we'll turn it into professional web copy that converts.

items.question: What happens after my website is built?
items.answer: You own everything. The website, domain, hosting, and all files. You can update it yourself or hire anyone to maintain it. No vendor lock-in, no ongoing fees unless you want our help.

items.question: Do you provide ongoing support and maintenance?
items.answer: We include 30 days of technical support and 7 days of revisions with every project. After that, ongoing maintenance is optional - many clients prefer to handle updates themselves since we build user-friendly sites.

items.question: Can I see examples of your work?
items.answer: Absolutely! Visit our Portfolio to see real projects we've built for restaurants, contractors, consultants, and online stores.

items.question: How do I get started?
items.answer: Choose your service and fill out the form. You'll get a contract and invoice within an hour. Pay when you're ready to start, and we'll have your site live within the promised timeframe.

items.question: Do you have a Technical Support policy?
items.answer: YES, 30 days of technical bug fixes included after project delivery. If something breaks due to our code, we fix it free.

items.question: Do you have a Revisions policy?
items.answer: YES, 7 days of unlimited revisions after delivery. Change colors, text, layout - whatever you need to make it perfect.

items.question: Do you have a money back policy?
items.answer: YES, full refund if we can't deliver what we promised within 24 hours of supposed completion. We've never had to use it, but it's there for your peace of mind.

items.question: Do you do SEO?
items.answer: Every website we build is SEO-optimized from day one - proper titles, meta descriptions, fast loading, mobile-friendly. We don't do ongoing SEO campaigns, but your site will be found on Google.

items.question: What about hosting and domains?
items.answer: Included for 1 year with most services. We register your domain, set up hosting, security/SSL, and configure everything. After 1 year, you can renew with us or take it anywhere - you own it all.
